function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of resilience in newly built dwellings against pandemics","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of resilience in newly built dwellings against future pandemics","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fragility of the built environment in the face of contagious diseases","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and compartmentalized spaces in communal facilities","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hospitals designed without containment spaces for walk-in patients and visitors, without internal containment options between wards, and without containment options in emergency departments","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate recreational spaces in public external spaces of apartment complexes","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate aisle design for social distancing","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate capacity for infectious disease and isolation wards","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in school facilities","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confined classroom spaces with traditional desk layouts increase the risk of disease transmission and close contact between students.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Narrow and long shopping aisles in supermarkets can lead to congestion and increased close contact between shoppers.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in open plan offices and schools","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation in communal and private spaces","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of early detection systems for sars-cov-2 in sewer networks","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation in large enclosed spaces such as open-plan offices and classrooms","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of fresh air inflow due to reluctance to provide windows that can be opened","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cross-floor contamination risk in elevator shafts","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential residence time of fine aerosols in elevator cabins","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited containment measures in communal spaces","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate pressure differentials and air circulation","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient containment space design","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to multiple bathrooms for majority of the population","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High probability of exposure in communal spaces of hotels and multi-residential complexes","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of reticulated air with a mandated percentage of fresh air","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of separate air cycles for communal and private spaces","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Designing spaces without consideration for self-isolation","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in buildings","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of compartmentalization in building design","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Infections supermarket aisles make it difficult for shoppers to maintain social distancing, increasing the risk of infection while passing in the aisles.","category":"Public environments.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Scholars designing energy programs may overlook the impact of electric vehicles on sustainability, leading to potential
